core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Legal Authority x Modern Tech Warmth
Content is King: Every pixel serves the legal narrative
Contrast: Deep Dark Hero vs. Paper-White Content
anti_patterns: No generic 'SaaS Blue' as primary color

usage_rules: Headings must use Merriweather for authority.
Body text must use Manrope for readability.
Use 'tracking-tight' on all headings larger than 32px.
Legal disclaimers should be small but high contrast (no grey-on-grey).

textures: Subtle grain overlay on dark backgrounds

buttons.primary: bg-amber-600 text-white hover:bg-amber-700 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-amber-600/20
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-amber-700 hover:bg-amber-50 rounded-md px-4 py-2 transition-colors

cards.feature: bg-white p-8 rounded-xl border border-slate-100 shadow-card hover:shadow-float transition-all duration-300 group
cards.pricing: bg-slate-900 text-white p-8 rounded-2xl border border-slate-800 relative overflow-hidden

inputs.default: h-12 bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-amber-500 focus:ring-amber-500/20 rounded-md transition-all

hero_lawyer.alt: Professional Indian lawyer working at desk
hero_lawyer.usage: Hero section or 'Find a Lawyer' feature highlight

document_signing.alt: Close up of hands signing legal documents
document_signing.usage: Document Generator section background or visual

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
No 'Lorem Ipsum' - use realistic legal placeholders (e.g., 'Rental Agreement', 'Non-Disclosure Agreement').
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building SunoLegal. Use the 'Golden Justice' palette. Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the features section. Use the provided image URLs for their respective sections. Ensure the 'Find a Lawyer' and 'Document Generator' sections feel functional, not just decorative. The AI Chat mockup should use a 'Tracing Beam' effect to feel alive.
